name: Starting The Game
description: Starting the Game is a funny fully-narrated indie game with gaming and tech memes.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32bit XP+ Processor: Core 2 Solo, 1.3Ghz (Penryn) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 32mb VRAM+ Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 Storage: 200 MB available space
